name: Pollinator (Not-Only But-Also)
description:
Jump on flowers to spread pollen and attract bees. Don't hit flowers. You're allergic. And don't get stung. Beware their buzzing.

The source code is available here: https://github.com/Not-OnlyBut-Also/pollinator For the best experience, follow the instructions in the README at that link. The browser version can take a long time to load and will not save high scores.

Music by Fez Goat.

Made for the Pygame Community Easter Jam 2023, with the themes Particle Overdose and Silly Music / Pastel Color Palette.
